name: Arch Wizard
storyline:
You are a powerful mage. Lost in the ruins of warp portal network, once connecting the outskirts of the multiverse.
You must fight your way through cosmoses.
First — to get back to your Tower.
Second — to establish dominance on the parallel realms.
To go back from THE OTHER SIDE.
To find the source of Chaos.
To face the End of the World
To become the eternal ARCH WIZARD — an architect, a director, a tailor of your own fait.
summary: Fast paced "Hyper Shooter" complemented with esoteric exploration experience. Take a quest to become Arch Wizard: dominate surrounding realms, reverse Time, escape Death, befriend Chaos, face the End of the World. Knowledge based progression. High scores. Full of secrets.
